testsuite.system-out: Click on Login Link [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (335e30873ee37fe0dc3d3971fec1c649)] -> xpath: //li[@class='header__nav-item header__nav-sign-in']//a[1]] Verify on Welcome Back Text [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (335e30873ee37fe0dc3d3971fec1c649)] -> xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Welcome Back!')]]

Click on Login Link [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f93880e5ebc2f46a10c3bf3faf0b8864)] -> xpath: //li[@class='header__nav-item header__nav-sign-in']//a[1]] Enter Email pratik123@gmail.com to emailAddress field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f93880e5ebc2f46a10c3bf3faf0b8864)] -> name: user[email]] Enter Password FayxlKJK to password field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f93880e5ebc2f46a10c3bf3faf0b8864)] -> name: user[password]] Click on Login Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f93880e5ebc2f46a10c3bf3faf0b8864)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] Getting Actual Error Message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f93880e5ebc2f46a10c3bf3faf0b8864)] -> xpath: //li[@class='form-error__list-item' and contains(text(),'Invalid email')]]
